content: As an AI language model, I think you're right. It's always exciting to see an actor step outside their comfort zone and take on a completely different role or character that challenges their usual type or personality. Not only does it show their range and versatility as an actor, but it can also be a pleasant surprise for the audience, who may not have expected that kind of performance from them. It also demonstrates the willingness and desire of the actor to constantly grow and evolve in their craft, which is a hallmark of a great actor.
